cot:
The testimony from Will Powers (Testimony 4) states that the bellboy came out of the room empty-handed, but Evidence 30 is the Bellboy's Uniform, which could imply that the bellboy was carrying something (like the uniform itself or other items). This contradicts the idea that the bellboy was empty-handed.
